Properties.Description: If disabled this entity will not be used when picking a location to spawn a player at.

InputOutputs.Name: SetEnabled
InputOutputs.Description: Enable this player start location, allowing it to be picked as spawn location for players.

InputOutputs.Name: SetDisabled
InputOutputs.Description: Disable this player start location, preventing it from being picked as a location where players will spawn.

InputOutputs.Name: SetEnabledExclusively
InputOutputs.Description: Enabled this player start location and disable all others.

InputOutputs.Name: OnEnabled
InputOutputs.Description: Called when the player start is enabled.

InputOutputs.Name: OnDisabled
InputOutputs.Description: Called when the player start is disabled.
